name: Green Arrow and the Green Cursor
name_original: Green Arrow and the Green Cursor
description:
Father and son day at work!, Green Arrow and his son the little Green Cursor go in a bow target practice adventure. Hit 100 parody famous characters and win 100 badges

Use left and Right to move your bow, Up and Down for slow move
Shoot one arrow by pressing Space Bar
P: Pause Game, R:Restart Level ESC:Back to Level Select

English and Spanish available
